casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Norris, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Norris, 123 Ohio St.3d 163, 2009-Ohio-4904.]

(No. 2009-0442 Submitted August 11, 2009 Decided September 22, 2009.) William D. Mason, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Kristen L. Sobieski, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Harris, 122 Ohio St.3d 373, 2009-Ohio-3323, 911 N.E.2d 882.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
